title: Temperature Calculation from NTC Resistance
description:
TEMP_NTC
Input RES: REAL (measured resistance in ohms)
RN: REAL (resistance of the sensor at 25°C)
B: REAL (specifcation of the sensor)
Output REAL (measured temperature)
TEMP_NTC calculates from the measured resistance and the parameters of
the sensor, the measured temperature. RN is the resistance of the sensor
at 25°C, and B depends on the sensor and the specifcation of the sensor.
The module calculates the temperature according to the following formu￾la:
name: TEMP_NTC

input.name: RES
input.description: The resistance value of the NTC thermistor.

input.name: RN
input.description: The nominal resistance of the thermistor at a reference temperature.

input.name: B
input.description: The material constant used in the calculation for the NTC thermistor.

return_value.description: The calculated temperature in degrees Celsius based on the thermistor resistance.
